entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
